data.Name: Pam McFarland
data.staff_bio: Pam is the database manager at ICI.  She comes from a clinical data background, having spent 7 years working on the databases for several NIH-funded studies.  She will be working with many projects at ICI including the National Service Inclusion Project (NSIP), Medicaid Infrastructure and Comprehensive Employment Opportunities (MI-CEO), Employment Services, the Technical Assistance and Continuing Education (TACE) Center and Think College.
